lead_paragraph: Our team of reporters fact-checked Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump on the economy, trade and other issues.

headline.print_headline: Assessing the Candidates’ Claims on Foreign Policy and the Economy
headline.main: Our Fact Checks of the First Debate

snippet: Our team of reporters fact-checked Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump on the economy, trade and other issues....
abstract: Analysis of Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump's claims on wide-ranging topics during first presidential debate, including foreign policy, economy, and their personal pasts.
